utilizatorilor ne-loga\u021bi.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":115,"is_accepted":false,"is_mandatory":false,"name":"tiktok","description":"TikTok - Remarketing More details","type":"Publicitate","type_id":3},{"id":116,"is_accepted":false,"is_mandatory":false,"name":"ga4","description":"Utilizat pentru managementul de date al utilizatorilor.","type":"Analiz\u0103","type_id":2},{"id":117,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"aid","description":"Utilizat pentru managementul de date al </script>

                                </li>
                                                            <li class="font-size-sm  visible-md visible-lg visible-xl">
                                    <a href="https://www.emag.ro/lps/oferta-zilei-selectie-produse-casa-si-gradina-13-mai-2023?ref=hdr_oferta-zilei" title="Oferta Zilei">
                                        Oferta Zilei
                                    </a>
                                </li>
                                                            <li class="font-size-sm  visible-md visible-lg visible-xl">
                                    <a href="https://www.emag.ro/voucher/gift-card?ref=effective_search" title="Cardul cu milioane de idei">
                                        Cardul cu milioane de idei
                                    </a>
                                </li>
                                                            <li class="font-size-sm   visible-lg visible-xl">
                                    <a href="https://www.emag.ro/nav/deals?ref=hdr_ofertele-emag" title="Ofertele eMAG">
                                        Ofertele eMAG
                                    </a>
                                </li>
                                                        <li class="font-size-sm hidden-lg hidden-xl ">
                                <a href="#" role="button" id="navbar-aux-dropdown" class="has-view-more" data-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-target="#navbar-aux-menu" data-ph-align="SW" data-ph-open-on="click" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="true">
                                    Vezi mai mult <span class="caret"></span>
                                </a>
                            </li></ul>
                                    
                        
            <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-right font-size-sm"><li><a href="https://www.emag.ro/help/?ref=hdr_help" class="navbar-aux-help-link" title="eMAG Help">
                            <i class="em em-support"></i>
                            eMAG Help                        </a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</nav>
                            
                        <div class="main-container-inner">
                <div class="main-container" id="main-container" role="main">

        <div class="container"><h2 class="page-section-title">&nbsp;</h2><div class="product-carousel carousel-loading ph-has-dots"><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div><div class="rec-card-item card-item card- js-card-item"><div class="card-v2 card-shimmer"></div></div></div></div>

    <div class="widget-newsletter-content">
        <h3 class="h1 mrg-sep-none">Abonează-te la newsletter eMAG și află de reducerile cu timp limitat!</h3>
        <p class="small">Prin abonarea la newsletter-ul eMAG confirm că am peste 16 ani.</p>

        <form class="form pad-top-sm" action="/newsletter-subscribe-widget" novalidate="true">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="form-group col-md-4">
                    <label class="sr-only">Nume</label>

                </div>

                    <label class="sr-only">Email</label>

                <div class="form-group col-md-4">
                    <button class="btn btn-danger btn-block js-recaptcha-button">Aboneaza-ma!</button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="js-recaptcha-badge" data-recaptcha-key="6LeGV3QUAAAAAE4aM2KFz3vZNzfxupNlWhRWJ8Ao"><div class="grecaptcha-badge" data-style="bottomright" style="width: 256px; height: 60px; position: fixed; visibility: hidden; display: block; transition: right 0.3s ease 0s; bottom: 14px; right: -186px; box-shadow: gray 0px 0px 5px; border-radius: 2px; overflow: hidden;"><div class="grecaptcha-logo"><iframe title="reCAPTCHA" src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/anchor?ar=1&amp;k=6LeGV3QUAAAAAE4aM2KFz3vZNzfxupNlWhRWJ8Ao&amp;co=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZW1hZy5ybzo0NDM.&amp;hl=ro&amp;v=wqcyhEwminqmAoT8QO_BkXCr&amp;size=invisible&amp;cb=n7j5at1o88wl" width="256" height="60" role="presentation" name="a-ghql0sfbidl8" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" sandbox="allow-forms allow-popups allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-modals allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox"></iframe></div><div class="grecaptcha-error"></div><textarea id="g-recaptcha-response" name="g-recaptcha-response" class="g-recaptcha-response" style="width: 250px; height: 40px; border: 1px solid rgb(193, 193, 193); margin: 10px 25px; padding: 0px; resize: none; display: none;"></textarea></div><iframe style="display: none;"></iframe></div>

        </div>
            </div>
</div>
</footer>
